name: Growth (Sakeiru)
description:
Grow your roots to explore the underground and make your tree change ! 

How to play ?
- Click on a root end to select it, and drag while holding to grow it. Moving consumes stamina that can be restored consuming nuts or slowly while waiting.

- Right click to unzoom to see what you explored so far, you can drag click to navitage.

Note : consuming nuts split your root in two, you can select the new branch created to avoid going backwards ! ;)

Have fun !
